body: Added a commit (for ease of review). It addresses all but the last comment, and also adjusts 虎 to 老虎 (which [means "tiger"](http://translate.google.com/#zh-CN/en/%E8%80%81%E8%99%8E)), on the advice of a friend (I know extremely little so if someone disagrees with this, it's no trouble to change back, or to something else entirely).

On second though, I think clicking through in rustdoc to the trait bound is good enough. Thanks again for this awesome work!

r=me with a squash (thanks for keeping separate during review)
